column3: Testing in #1242 confirms that the Ubuntu menu+icon issue is solved by these changes.\n

Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/9a2305a1b3075d110f4127a3d3c38b014237968a for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/cu
